musicalLanguage.description: A stunning piano-driven ballad that showcases Alicia Keys' classical training. The cascading intro arpeggios and rich chord voicings make it a masterclass in modern R&B piano.
musicalLanguage.structure: Intro (piano solo) - Verse - Pre-chorus - Chorus - Verse - Pre-chorus - Chorus - Bridge - Chorus - Outro
keyMoments: Piano intro: the cascading descending arpeggios that define the song
Verse: gospel-influenced chord voicings with passing tones
Chorus: powerful melodic arc on 'If I ain't got you'
teachingGoals: Arpeggiated intro patterns across wide range
